name: New Sun STR Herbal Capsules (100 caps)
description:
STR Herbal Capsules

In today's fast pace and competitive world, many people have increased stress and difficulty coping with job responsibilities, competition, raising a family and other responsibilities.  STR helps to smooth those nerves, excitability, and occasional restless nights.  STR was formulated using herbs that have historically helped cope with everyday stress.

Ingredients: Chamomile (flower), Skullcap (herb), Hops (flower), Lady Slipper (flower).

Please note:  These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration.  This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease.  This information is for educational purposes only. 

Neither New Sun, Inc. nor Aromatherapy Now LLC dba Mount Olympus Wellness, or any of their subsidiaries, dispense medical advice, prescribe remedies, or assume responsibility for those who choose to treat themselves.  Consult a healthcare professional before using these or any product during pregnancy or if you have a serious medical condition.  (100 capsules)
(Reg. Price:  $18.34)

name: New Sun Spirulina Herbal Capsules (200 caps)
description:
Spirulina Herbal Capsules with Blue/Green Algae

Limit 4 Per Customer

Spirulina is known as one of the top miracle foods.  It is a single cell type of algae that thrives in warm, alkaline, fresh water where it multiplies.  Spirulina is one of the most natural, clean and sterile foods that can be found in nature.  It is a high source of natural Beta Carotene, Vitamin D and GLA (Gamma Linolenic Acid).  Spirulina contains all nine essential Amino Acids.  It is extremely high in natural protein, much higher than beef.

Spirulina is a food that has extremely long shelf life and is great to store for any future emergency.  It contains 26 times the calcium of milk and has a good supply of niacin and phosphorus.  It is of great help to almost any kind of aliment known to mankind.  It helps build the blood, give energy and supports strengthening of cells and tissue.  Spirulina helps balance blood sugar and assists in satisfying hunger.  It helps balance RNA/DNA, helps the brain function and helps give better mental clarity.

Energy and a keen alertness are noticed in a few short days of taking Spirulina.  It is a complete protein and contains the complete B-Complex vitamins, essential trace minerals and fatty acids.  It helps the body to detoxify in a natural way and eventually will help rid the body of toxic poisons.  It assists the body with mineral absorption and helps.

Some helpful benefits of Spirulina include:  Blood Builder Blood Cleanser, and the Finest Tonic.

Ingredients: Spirulina.

Please note: These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration.  This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease.  This information is for educational purposes only.  

Neither New Sun, Inc. nor Aromatherapy Now LLC dba Mount Olympus Wellness, or any of their subsidiaries, dispense medical advice, prescribe remedies, or assume responsibility for those who choose to treat themselves.  Consult a healthcare professional before using these or any product during pregnancy or if you have a serious medical condition.  (200 capsules)
(Reg. Price:  $36.96)

name: New Sun Life Source Herbal Capsules (120 caps)
description:
Life Source Herbal Capsules:  Green Drink in an Herbal Capsule

Limit 4 Per Customer

Contains vitamins and minerals in their natural state from plants and greens . . . not man-made.  Safe Superior Quality, Concentrated Food for the Future, No Caffeine, No Stimulants, No Sweeteners and All Natural.

Spirulina - Supports energy, weight control, natural B-12 and other natural vitamins and minerals including Beta Carotene, six times more Calcium than milk.

Chlorella - Natural cleanser of toxic metals, purifier, powerful in Chlorophyll, natural Iron and blood builders, known as nature's green magic.  Helps control monthly Calcium loss, RNA/DNA.

Alfalfa - Known as the "Father of all Foods," high in vitamins and minerals, trace elements, a good source of Vitamin A and K, it has eight essential Amino Acids, is high in Chlorophyll.

Wheat Grass - A super source of vitamins.  Grows seven inches and is cut at the root, this juice concentrate is a complete food high in enzymes, it assists in cleansing and rebuilding, it is a neutralizer of toxins, and helps the skin and most organs.

Barley Juice - It is a quick source of energy in high quality food like Spirulina, Chlorella, and Alfalfa.  It is very nutritious. 

Carrot Powder - This concentrated freeze-dried carrot powder is activated when liquid is added and mixed in.  It is a high source of Beta Carotene and is known as an antioxidant and an immune helper.

Flax Seed - It is an excellent source of Omega 3, 6, 8, and Alpha-Linoleic Acid.  Omega 6 and Oleic Acid assist in healthy nutrition in many areas, such as: immunity, flexibility, nourishes skin, and a sense of well-being.

Bilberry - Protection for the eyes, night vision, veins, nerves, the central nervous system, circulatory system, and helps strengthen weak capillaries.

Milk Thistle - Used in Europe for years in cleansing and rebuilding of liver, it is the great liver protector against drugs that harm the liver.

Royal Jelly - Vitality, skin tone, stress, immune system, and high in vitamins.

Ginkgo Biloba Extract - Touted in most of the world as a memory enhancer, promotes a healthy vascular system and immune system and helps increase energy.

Apple Pectin and Oat Bran - Both are a high source of necessary fiber and colon cleansers.

Cinnamon - In the Orient, this has been used as a catalyst in many food and herb combinations.

Earth Zyme Base (Exclusive and proprietary for New Sun) - A natural source of minerals, cultures, trace elements, and probiotics.

Ingredients: Chlorella (cracked Cell Concentrate), Spirulina Concentrate, Alfalfa Juice Concentrate, Carrot (root), Ginkgo Biloba (leaf) Extract, Milk Thistle (seed) Concentrate, Royal Jelly, Wheat Grass Concentrate, Bilberry (fruit) Concentrate, Cinnamon (bark), Flax (seed) oil, Pine (bark) Extract, Apple Pectin, Barley Juice Concentrate, Bromelain, Earthzyme, Co-Enzyme Q10, Vitamin E.

Please note: These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease. This information is for educational purposes only.  

Neither New Sun, Inc. nor Aromatherapy Now LLC dba Mount Olympus Wellness, or any of their subsidiaries, dispense medical advice, prescribe remedies, or assume responsibility for those who choose to treat themselves.  Consult a healthcare professional before using these or any product during pregnancy or if you have a serious medical condition.  (120 capsules)
(Reg. Price:  $24.50)

name: New Sun Immune 101 Herbal Capsules (100 caps)
description:
Immune 101 Herbal Capsules:  A New Beginning for Better Immune Health

Limit 4 Per Customer

A safe and very effective immune product that can take your immune health to the next level! It is very helpful for those who are "run-down" and under stress. This amazing product contains eighteen selected herbs to feed and nourish just about every part of the body.

The leading herbs of major significance are: • Agaricus Blazei Murill 4:1 Concentrate • Astragalus Root • Panax Ginseng • Ganoderma • Schizandra 4:1 Concentrate followed by 15 other herbs assisting these five major herbs in supporting a healthy immune system. Immune 101 is non-stimulating and completely safe to take in almost every situation.

Feel the difference with Immune 101!

Ingredients: Astragalus (root) (huang qi), Reishi (fruiting body) (ling zhi), Asian Ginseng (root) (ren shen), Schisandra (fruit) Concentrate, Agaricus Concentrate (Agaricus Blazel Murill), Lycium (fruit) Concentrate ( gou qi zi concentrate), Dong Quai (root) (dang gui tou), Eqimedium (leaf) (yin yang hou), Bai-Zhu Attractylodes (rhizome) (bai zhu), Achyranthes (root) (huai niu xi), Chinese Peony (root) (bia shao), Eucommia (bark) (du zhung), Grapefruit, Lemon and Lime (peel), Ligustrum (fruit) (nu zhen zi), Ophiopogon (root) (mai dong), Polygala (root) (yuan zhi_, Poria (fu ling), Rehmannia (root) Concentrate (shu di huang concentrate).

Please note: These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease. This information is for educational purposes only.

name: Essential Oil - Rosemary (1/2 oz)
description: Rosemary Essential Oil from New Sun.  100% Pure and Natural.  Reiki-infused.  Botanical Name:  Rosmarinus officinalis.  Aroma is fresh, herbaceous, sweet, and slightly medicinal.  Beneficial for boredom, colds, coughs, flu, lack of energy, muscle tightness, negative state of mind, nervous tension, poor circulation, stiff joints (not to be used for inflammatory arthritis), sinus congestion, tired mind.   Applications:  Bath, inhalant, or massage.  Warnings:  Avoid on hypersensitive skin.  Maintain adequate room ventilation to avoid eye irritation.  Any strong odor may trigger an epileptic incident in persons suffering from epilepsy.  Avoid if suffering from high blood pressure.  Avoid during pregnancy.  FOR EXTERNAL USE ONLY.  Keep out of reach of children.  Can irritate sensitive skin types.  (1/2 fl oz/15 ml)  (Price:  $15.26)

name: Essential Oil - Tea Tree (1/2 oz)
description: Tea Tree Essential Oil from New Sun.  100% Pure and Natural.  Reiki-infused.  Botanical Name:  Melaleuca alternifolia.  Aroma is medicinal, fresh, woody, earthy, and herbaceous.  Beneficial for colds, coughs, lack of energy, muscular aches and pains, nasal congestion, nervous exhaustion, and poor circulation.  Applications:  Bath, inhalant, or massage.  Warnings:  When used directly on the skin (neat), it may cause exfoliation of the dead layers of the skin.  Avoid on sensitive tissues unless diluted.  FOR EXTERNAL USE ONLY.  Keep out of reach of children.  Can irritate sensitive skin types.  (1/2 fl oz/15 ml)  (Price:  $20.86)

name: Treatment Room Spray - CUSTOM BLENDED (4 oz)
description: Reiki Natural™ Treatment Room Spray - Custom Blended.  Reiki-infused and handmade with rose water and blended with your choice of pure and natural essential oils.  Choose up to three from our list of essential oils or let us choose for you.  Please indicate your choice at checkout.  Contains small pieces of rose quartz.  A great way to purify your treatment room and/or hands and to create a relaxing environment.  (4 fl oz/120 ml in blue glass sprayer bottle)  (Price:  $28)

name: Line Treatment Roll-On - CUSTOM BLENDED (1/3 oz)
description: Reiki Natural™ Line Treatment Roll-On - Custom Blended.  Reiki-infused.  Diminishes the appearance of expression lines, and fine lines under the eyes and around the mouth.
